hero_subtitle: Get senior engineering leadership without the full-time commitment. Build better products, make smarter tech decisions, and scale your team effectively.
personal_message_1: Hi there! I'm Laurent, and I've spent over 10 years helping startups and growing companies navigate the complex world of technology leadership.
personal_message_2: I know how overwhelming it can feel when you're building something amazing but need technical guidance without the commitment of a full-time CTO. That's exactly why I created this service.
personal_message_3: Whether you're a founder who needs someone to translate business goals into technical strategy, or a growing team that needs architectural guidance, I'm here to help you make the right decisions at the right time.
problem_title: The Challenge Every Growing Company Faces
problem_subtitle: Building software without senior technical leadership is like sailing without a compass
problem_card_1: You want to build software, but don't have a CTO to guide technical decisions and strategy.
problem_card_2: Hiring a full-time CTO is too expensive or premature for your current stage and budget.
problem_card_3: Without senior guidance, product decisions and tech choices can become expensive mistakes that slow you down.
solution_subtitle: Get the technical leadership you need, when you need it, without the full-time commitment
solution_point_1: Build or modernize your product with experienced hands-on coding and architecture.
solution_point_2: Ensure technical decisions align with your business goals and long-term vision.
solution_point_3: Build the foundation for smooth scaling with proper processes and team structure.
services_subtitle: Comprehensive technical leadership across all aspects of your product development
services_card_1: Rapid development of minimum viable products and internal tools that solve real business problems efficiently.
services_card_2: Choose the right technology stack and system architecture that scales with your business needs.
services_card_3: Level up your existing development team through code reviews, best practices, and hands-on mentoring.
services_card_4: Define technical roles, interview candidates, and build your engineering team with the right talent.
services_card_5: Implement continuous integration, deployment pipelines, and testing frameworks for long-term maintainability.
services_card_6: Seamless transition when you hire in-house, with full documentation and knowledge transfer to ensure continuity.
pricing_subtitle: Monthly retainer packages designed to fit your needs and budget
pricing_note_text: No HR/sales ops. I focus on engineering, architecture, and delivery. I make myself replaceable when you hire in-house.
target_subtitle: Perfect for companies at the right stage for fractional technical leadership
target_card_1_description: Early-stage companies that need technical leadership but aren't ready for a full-time CTO hire.
target_card_2_description: Small and medium enterprises developing internal tools or customer-facing software solutions.
target_card_3_description: Established businesses looking to modernize legacy systems or rebuild existing products with better technology.
contact_subtitle: Send a short note about your product, stage, and goals. Let's discuss how fractional CTO services can accelerate your success.
contact_form_message: Tell me about your product and goals
contact_form_message_placeholder: What are you building? What challenges are you facing? What are your goals?
process_subtitle: A structured approach to ensure successful outcomes and smooth transitions
process_step_1_description: Define scope, identify risks, and establish clear success criteria for the engagement.
process_step_2_description: Regular planning sessions to set priorities and make strategic trade-offs.
process_step_3_description: Iterative development with regular milestones and continuous delivery.
process_step_4_description: Seamless transition when you hire in-house, with complete documentation and knowledge transfer.
process_benefit_1_description: Everyone knows what success looks like from day one.
process_benefit_2_description: Weekly cycles ensure rapid progress and quick course corrections.
process_benefit_3_description: Complete handover ensures continuity when you hire full-time.
footer_brand_description: Technical leadership on-demand for growing companies
meta_title: Laurent Curau - Fractional CTO Services | Technical Leadership On-Demand
meta_description: Get senior engineering leadership without the full-time commitment. Laurent Curau provides fractional CTO services to help startups and growing companies build better products, make smarter tech decisions, and scale effectively.
meta_keywords: fractional CTO, technical leadership, startup CTO, engineering consultant, technology strategy, software architecture, team scaling, tech advisor, Monaco
meta_og_description: Technical leadership on-demand for growing companies. Build better products, make smarter tech decisions, and scale your team effectively.
